param_schema.description: Whether to use tiled sampling for better quality on larger videos

param_schema.title: Cfg Scale
param_schema.description: Classifier free guidance scale (higher values strengthen prompt adherence)

param_schema.title: Num Frames
param_schema.description: Number of frames to generate in the output video

param_schema.description: Aspect ratio for the output video

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.default: low quality, blurry, distorted, disfigured, text, watermark

param_schema.title: Negative Prompt
param_schema.default: low quality, blurry, distorted, disfigured, text, watermark
param_schema.description: Negative prompt to specify what to avoid in the generation

parameters.name: denoising_strength

param_schema.title: Denoising Strength
param_schema.description: Strength of denoising when using video-to-video mode. Higher values change more content.

parameters.description: Strength of denoising when using video-to-video mode. Higher values change more content.

param_schema.title: Num Inference Steps
param_schema.description: Number of sampling steps (higher = better quality but slower)
